channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Cat Chat
channel.desc: Moses is learning music and the Cat Chat family is talking all about the Mass. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: International Children?s Rosary
channel.desc: Experience the innocence and love children bring to Jesus and Our Lady in prayer as members of the Children?s Rosary prayer group lead the Sorrowful Mysteries of the Rosary. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.title: The Holy Rosary With Mother Angelica
channel.desc: Mother Angelica and the Poor Clares of Perpetual Adoration recite the Sorrowful Mysteries of the Rosary from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Live Adoration From Ewtn Chapel
channel.desc: From Our Lady of the Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Web Of Faith 2.0
channel.desc: Topics include regular attendance at Sunday Mass, whether a Catholic may do yoga or undergo hypnosis, organ donation, gaining indulgences, receiving God?s mercy and forgiveness, the ?Rapture,? and how to live by faith. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Doctors Of The Church
channel.desc: In a bitterly divisive time, St. Francis de Sales brought many souls back to the Catholic Church. This Doctor?s message of God?s abundant love during the Protestant Reformation saved the Church in its time of need. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: They Might Be Saints Rhoda Wise
channel.desc: In Canton, Ohio, Rhoda Wise was well-known as a mystic with many spiritual gifts and healing miracles, one of them experienced by Rita Rizzo, the future Mother Angelica. Michael O?Neill relates her remarkable story. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Journey Home
channel.desc: Former Presbyterian Nathan Wigfield from the Thomas More Retreat Center in Northwest PA shares his journey to the Catholic faith. Marcus Grodi hosts. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Rosary In French
channel.desc: The Agony, Scourging, Crowning with Thorns, Carrying the Cross and Crucifixion help us to accept pain and perseverance to the very end. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Centrafrique: Quand La Vengeance Devient La Loi!
channel.desc: La R?publique centrafricaine (RCA) est un pays enclav? avec une population d'environ 4,5 millions d'habitants. Le pays est riche en ressources naturelles, y compris les diamants, l'or, le p?trole et l'uranium, mais en m?me temps, il a l'une des populations les plus d?munies du monde avec environ 71% vivant en dessous du seuil de pauvret?. En 2013, la RCA s?est retrouv?e dans la tourmente lorsque des milices essentiellement musulmanes ont form? une coalition (S?l?ka) et ont pris le pouvoir dans le pays ? majorit? chr?tienne. Un groupe de milices majoritairement chr?tiennes, appel?es anti-Balaka, s'est soulev? contre la S?l?ka. Un Centrafricain sur quatre est un d?plac? interne ou r?fugi? ? l'?tranger. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Speaking Of Saints
channel.desc: Host Susan Conroy continues her look into how Teresa of Calcutta viewed prayer in our everyday lives. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Cambodge, Renaitre Dans Les Champs De La Mort
channel.desc: La pers?cution totale de tous les citoyens cambodgiens a commenc? avec la fondation d?un nouveau Kampuch?a d?mocratique et l?introduction de ? l?ann?e z?ro ?. Les Khmers rouges ont ferm? les ?coles, les h?pitaux et les usines, liquid? les banques et abolit l?argent, criminalis? la religion et interdit la propri?t? priv?e. Selon certaines estimations, le nombre de gens assassin?s, affam?s ou d?c?d?s des suites de maladies pendant le r?gne de pr?s de quatre ans de Pol Pot s??l?ve ? un peu moins de deux millions de Cambodgiens; pr?s d?un quart de la population totale du pays. L??glise catholique a ?t? pratiquement an?antie. Les premiers signes d?ouverture vers l??glise sont arriv?s dans les ann?es 1990 quand le nombre de catholiques s??levait ? 3 000. Depuis lors, les missionnaires, pr?tres et religieuses, ont lentement tendu la main aux fid?les et aujourd?hui, l??glise compte un peu plus de 20 000 membres ? rien que 0,15 % de la population totale. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Faith And Life
channel.desc: He?s a priest, author, college lecturer and an exorcist whose services are in demand now more than ever. Fr. Pat Collins, a Vincentian priest based in Dublin, joins host Campbell Miller for a fascinating conversation. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Journey Home
channel.desc: Former Presbyterian Nathan Wigfield from the Thomas More Retreat Center in Northwest PA shares his journey to the Catholic faith. Marcus Grodi hosts. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Iceland, ?across The Icy Desert?
channel.desc: Three Capuchin priests who shepherd and love the miniscule Catholic community in Iceland, attend to the people?s deep need for spiritual nourishment in a place of material bounty. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The "reformation"
channel.desc: The Church in England, previously aligned with Rome, becomes the latest casualty of the ?Reformation,? as St. Thomas More defends the Catholic faith against King Henry VIII at the cost of his own life. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Explore With The Miracle Hunter
channel.desc: ?Miracle Hunter? Michael O?Neill travels to Champion, Wisconsin, where the Virgin Mary appeared to Belgian farm worker Adele Brise in 1859. This is the first and only Church-approved Marian apparition in the U.S. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Real Life Catholic
channel.desc: While in Los Angeles, Chris Stefanick reflects on what makes every person infinitely valuable, hears the stories of gangsters who found Jesus, and celebrates life at OneLife LA. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saints For Today
channel.desc: Father John Horgan explores the life of Blessed Gaetano Catanoso and the community of sisters he founded to wipe away Jesus' tears, not on His human face, but mystically present in the faces of all of us. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother looks at how we can experience joy even in difficulties by surrendering to God's will. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: God's Blueprint For A Happy Life
channel.desc: Deacon Harold and Fr. Mullady explore right-to-life issues, and how the taking of innocent life, death penalty and just war theory run counter to the Gospels and God's blueprint for a happy life. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Biblical Story Of The Mass
channel.desc: Fr. Wade and Tom Nash host a discussion and share insight into ancient Isreal as a liturgical training ground. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Glorious Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (18 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Divine Child Jesus
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite the litany of the Divine Child Jesus from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (12 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Scripture And Tradition With Fr. Mitch Pacwa
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch looks at the oracles from the Lord in Isaiah, and how Judah?s trust in the Egyptian Pharaoh, led to the mentality of ?eat, drink and be merry, for tomorrow we die.?. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Grandparents
channel.desc: Fr. Mallon reiterates how grandparents play a flexible role in different families; Guest Maria Maldonado shares the role her grandparents played in raising her. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saint Elisabeth Hesselblad
channel.desc: The early life of Elisabeth Hesselblad, a convert to the Catholic faith, who became the first Swedish saint in modern times. She founded a new order with many convents worldwide. (40 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: For The Sake Of The Gospel
channel.desc: A documentary on Mother Scholastica, founding member of the Sister Disciples of the Divine Master, whose case for canonization has been submitted to the Vatican?s Congregation for the Causes of Saints. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Fr. Hugh Gillespie explores the Blessed Virgin?s mothering of Jesus and her spiritual motherhood to us all in the manner that Proverbs suggests. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholics, The Bible & The Early Church
channel.desc: Father Harold Cohen S.J. continues his series on Catholic teachings and how they are rooted in the Bible and the beliefs of the Early Church with a look at the biblical foundations for the Church?s understanding of the Eucharist. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saints Vs. Scoundrels
channel.desc: While discussing the Saint?s tumultuous youth and conversion, Dr. Benjamin Wiker and St. Francis of Assisi are interrupted by Political Theorist Niccol? Machiavelli, who wastes no time expressing his disdain for the Franciscan way of life. Part 1 of 2. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chesterton Station
channel.desc: English crime novelist Dorothy L. Sayers arrives at the station, and immediately the outline of a dead body spurs a murder investigation led by G.K. Chesterton as Sherlock Holmes. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Living Divine Mercy
channel.desc: Fr. Jason Lewis explains the Church?s position on the private revelations at Medjugorje, and shares his own experience of its spiritual phenomena. Benjamin Stenlund also joins. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Get A Life In Christ
channel.desc: This episode is on the virtue of prudence. Father claims that it is a virtue that many Americans do not appreciate, nor do we cultivate it. He claims that we like wild and crazy activities and avoid the prudent path. He also points out what we loose as a nation by not cultivating this virtue. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Fr. Leo Clifford explains why "The Word of God is inexhaustible" and how God wants us to spend our lives learning about the Trinity so that we can love Him more. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Vaticano
channel.desc: Discover the ongoing Jubilee events during the Sede Vacante, and the connection between faith and entrepreneurship, and, visit the church of Trinit? dei Monti to venerate St. Therese of Lisieux?s relics. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: Three Capuchin priests who shepherd and love the miniscule Catholic community in Iceland, attend to the people?s deep need for spiritual nourishment in a place of material bounty. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: Discover what Rob and friends find behind a secret attic door and learn more about the origins and necessity of the Pope that began when Jesus called Peter to lead His Church. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: International Children?s Rosary
channel.desc: Members of the Children?s Rosary prayer movement lead the Glorious Mysteries in a unique Rosary experience embracing Jesus and our Heavenly Mother. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Savoring Our Faith
channel.desc: Fr. Leo Patalinghug shows how parents can draw their kids into the kitchen to prepare some fun dishes together while sharing important quality time together. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: At Home With Jim And Joy
channel.desc: Jim and Joy reflect on those who gave the ultimate sacrifice for our country this Memorial Day. Lt. Col. Kenneth Borland?s mother, Adrienne Borland, tells his story. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: I Forgive, With Immacul?e Ilibagiza
channel.desc: When you?re stuck at the bottom, learning how to forgive yourself is the only way to survive. Patricia Sandoval shares her story of overcoming homelessness, drug abuse and multiple abortions to find healing and purpose. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother looks at how we can experience joy even in difficulties by surrendering to God's will. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Rosary In French
channel.desc: The Glorious Mysteries of the Resurrection, Ascension, Pentecost, Assumption and The Coronation of May help us to receive the graces of faith in the Eternal Life, desire for Heaven, docility to the Holy Spirit, a holy death and the Communion of Saints. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: An Ewtn Holy Land Experience
channel.desc: Fr. Joseph and Fr. Mark reflect on the life of Mary as they visit the sites blessed by the presence of the Mother of God. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholic Church Through The Ages
channel.desc: Fr. Connor discusses the contributions of the Fathers of the Church, Ss. Athanasius, Jerome, Ambrose, Augustine, and Cyril of Alexandria. The theological terms homoousious, hypostatic union and Theotokos explain the relation of the divine and human natures of Christ, as well as the related doctrine of Mary as truly the Mother of God. (30 minutes).

channel.title: From The Heart, With Mother Angelica
channel.desc: Mother Angelica relates the Parable of the Sower. She explains how the sower is Jesus and the seed is the word of God. Just as a planted seed grows in the ground, the word of God starts to deepen and grow within us. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn Live
channel.desc: Dr. Stuart shares the University of St. Thomas? Graduate Program in Sexuality and Gender which equips students to speak the truth of the Faith, when discussing gender identity. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Bob And Penny Lord Present
channel.desc: Bob and Penny Lord explore the life of St. Faustina and how God used this humble Polish nun to share The Divine Mercy of Jesus with the whole world. (30 minutes).

channel.title: new! Catholic Sphere
channel.desc: Every week a different host brings on a panel of 3 experts to tackle topics on the minds of Catholics. From theology to social media, from young parents to the universal church, surround yourself with solid answers as you enter the Catholic Sphere! (30 minutes).

channel.title: Holy Land Rosary: Luminous Mysteries
channel.desc: Father Mitch Pacwa gives short meditations on each of the Five Mysteries of Light introduced by Pope John Paul II. (20 minutes).

channel.title: The Litany Of The Most Blessed Sacrament
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite a litany in honor of the Most Blessed Sacrament from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Good Or Evil: Who Decides?
channel.desc: Many people outside the church don?t understand priestly celibacy. Apologist and author Dr. Raymond De Souza explains the reason for priestly celibacy as well as sacred scripture to back it up. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Revelation: The Second Coming
channel.desc: CH. 8-11 HEAVENLY BATTLE -DEVILCAST TO HELL- HAS GONE DOWN EARTH IN RAGE- BECAUSE HE KNOWS HIS DAYS ARE NUMBERED. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Grandparents
channel.desc: Fr. Mallon looks at the trials and joys large families experience; How one family says their Catholic faith has kept them grounded throughout the generations. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Journey Home
channel.desc: Former Presbyterian Nathan Wigfield from the Thomas More Retreat Center in Northwest PA shares his journey to the Catholic faith. Marcus Grodi hosts. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Fr. Hugh Gillespie explains St. Louis de Montfort?s depiction of Mary as the fruitful Virgin, who can produce marvels of grace in a soul and lead us to intimacy with Jesus. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Choices We Face
channel.desc: Ralph Martin and Peter Herbeck discuss Peter?s new booklet, "Does God Judge?," and in what ways God?s judgment is an indication of His profound love for us. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Meditations On The Ascension Of Our Lord
channel.desc: Father Benedict Groeschel, CFR, talks about the significance of Our Lord's Ascension into Heaven as recorded in the second chapter of Acts, both in the lives of the Apostles, first -century. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Papal Audience With Pope Leo Xiv
channel.desc: From the Vatican, Pope Leo XIV delivers his weekly address to the faithful. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Regina Caeli With The Sisters Of Our Lady Of Angels
channel.desc: The sisters of Our Lady of the Angels recite the glorious prayer to Our Lady Queen of Heaven: The Regina Caeli. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Gospel Glimpses
channel.desc: People have ideologies, so they focus on partial truths and lose sight of the big picture. But saints were whole people, able to see the entirety of reality, a fact affirmed by the Church through their canonization. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Father Leo Clifford discusses how Jesus brought God to live and dwell in our own being and how we must learn to accept this and live it. (10 minutes).

channel.title: Catholic Sphere
channel.desc: Every week a different host brings on a panel of 3 experts to tackle topics on the minds of Catholics. From theology to social media, from young parents to the universal church, surround yourself with solid answers as you enter the Catholic Sphere! (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Ascension
channel.desc: Our Lord's ascension as seen through through the eyes of a fictitious soldier. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Adventure Catechism
channel.desc: God gave us the 10 Commandments to love and serve him by. Jesus spoke about two of them that are greater, and will help us fulfill the rest. Discover the blessings that come to every life when we obey the commandments. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Lukas Storyteller
channel.desc: The kids of the reef prepare for grandparents? day. Noah tells the children about Anne and Joachim, the grandparents of Jesus, and Lukas explains how grandparents fill us with love, and bring us closer to Jesus. (15 minutes).
